thread.section_title: Dyers RV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dyers RV | dyersonline.com
thread.title: Weekender

author: Weekender
title: Weekender
text: I ordered several items from Dryers at noon on a Tuesday. I received conformation that the order had been received. The next day my wife texted me that I had several boxes on the porch for me. Found my complete order there. Just 24 hours after placing the order. Two days later I got the tracking number for my order. That is the fastest delivery I have ever had. Great products at a great price with fast shipping.
